name: Wirestrike
description:
:

Wirestrike is an unconventional twin-stick / bullet-hell game in which you can stun and grab enemy ships and other objects and smash them against everything else! Fight your enemies stage by stage and survive until the end using all your offensive and defensive skills.

SHOOT AND BOOM!

Wirestrike is a single-player twin-stick / bullet-hell shooter in which you can destroy your enemies with style! Move and aim freely in space and destroy enemy ships with your powerful main cannons and enjoy the destruction! Face the enemy ships in the deep space and take advantage of your special-and-stylish attack: the WIRESTRIKE!

STUN AND GRAB!

Use your main cannons, your lasers and a missile barrage to damage and stun enemy ships in order to grab them with your mechanical hook and perform the WIRESTRIKE! Smash them against other enemies and find your unique way to destroy your targets and complete each stage alternating between different skill sets in order to survive until the end.

Remember...you can always count on your defensive skills: a healing-laser and the protective shields!

STRIKE AND SCORE!

Boost the score-multiplier each time you destroy an enemy with the WIRESTRIKE and survive stage after stage. Break the enemy defenses by strategically using your Power-Ups while dodging bullet after bullet. Break all the rules, use your enemies as a flail and become the new king of space!

DEVELOPED BY: 

GRYFFIN PORK (EVENT HORIZON SCHOOL TURIN, YEAR 1 - 2017/2018)

GAME DESIGN:
Ilario Mercurio
Manuel Bo

PROGRAMMING:
Gabriele Ferreccio
Francesco Micheletti

3D ART:
Antonio Cuomo
Beatrice Gatti

CONCEPT ART:
Benedetta Lasagno
Francesca Siviero
